about_the_game:
WARRNING

Don't show Your mom this game. You know what can happen... Think twice before clicking "Read more". End of message.


INFORMATION ABOUT YOUR MISSION

So, You clicked... You are a mom or You like the risk. In that case go to Egypt on an amazing adventure and explore all the ancient temples full of diamonds! If you're master (You are master!), you’ll get special bonuses, that'll help you in dangerous temples. There is no time, but Your every move in the temple is limited. The Lord MUMBA is guarding his treasures will you get them all?

SCARAB

Use the powerful Scarab to change the colors of the jewels and create powerful combinations . Do not be afraid.


JOIN NOW

Join a group of elite adventures, buy MUMBA IV: Egypt Jewels © now!

FEATURES

- Over 50 temples with bosses to explore!

- No time only You and balls!
- 29 languages supported
- Fight with bosses guarding the temple
- Story
- Simple mechanics! You can play using only the mouse!
- Atmospheric ancient music
- Secret temples (you need to find artifacts to enter them)
- Over 30 hours of fun (all levels, secret temples, bosses, Steam Achievements etc.) ***
- Each level is unique and has different difficulties
- Support mouse, keyboard or gamepad
- Beautiful graphics
- Relaxing music and sound effects
- Each temple has a goals
- Defeat MUMBA and take all Egyptian jewels
- 100 Steam Achievements
- Steam Cloud
- Game was created by a one-man studio and inspired by many puzzles

***My mom tested it, she is a professional gamer (she plays Candy Saga Crash, Bust a Move, The Lines - 100% achievements). 30 hours = all temples , secret temples, bosses, Steam Achievements

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 32/64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1,66 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Support all resolutions (21:9, ultrawide etc.)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.7
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Support all resolutions (21:9, ultrawide etc.)

name: MUMBA IV: Egypt Jewels Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 32/64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1,66 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Support all resolutions (21:9, ultrawide etc.)

short_description: Your task in MUMBA IV is to destroy coloured jewels in a limited number of moves and earn the highest possible number of points. The players of all age groups will definitely like amazing graphics and fun gameplay. MUMBA is watching You. He won't give you the jewels.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian
